price: Ɛberε a yεde apͻnkͻ a yɛayεn wͻn yie na wͻn ho yε hare brεε no (dabi) anwummerε no,
arabic: إِذۡ عُرِضَ عَلَيۡهِ بِٱلۡعَشِيِّ ٱلصَّٰفِنَٰتُ ٱلۡجِيَادُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: idh ʿuriḍa ʿalayhi bil-ʿashiyi al-ṣāfinātu al-jiyādu
